articles.headline: Russia Tells Ukrainian Forces To "Lay Down Arms" In Key Eastern City

articles.headline: Canada Is Lifting Covid Vaccine Mandate For Domestic, Overseas Travel

articles.headline: China's Attack Would Hit Global Trade More Than Ukraine War: Taiwan

articles.headline: Jailed Putin Critic Navalny Transferred to "Strict-Regime" Penal Colony: Report
articles.description: Jailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny has been transferred to a strict-regime penal colony, his allies said on Tuesday, expressing concern about his safety.

articles.headline: Joe Biden Signals US-Saudi Thaw With Crown Prince Meeting On Mideast Trip
articles.description: US President Joe Biden will meet with Saudi Arabian Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman next month, abandoning efforts to ostracize the kingdom's de facto leader over the horrific murder of a dissident.

articles.headline: Have Enough Ammunition, But Need Long Range Weapons Says Volodymyr Zelenskyy
articles.description: Russia-Ukraine War: Ukrainian President said Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Ukraine's military has enough ammunition and weapons, but needs more long-range weapons.

articles.headline: Mob Leader's WW II Medal Of Freedom To Be Auctioned In California
articles.description: A Medal of Freedom awarded to a mobster by then-US President Harry S. Truman is set to be auctioned California. Meyer "The Little Man" Lansky was a leader of the National Crime Syndicate that was responsible of many murders in 1930s and 1940s.

articles.headline: "It Was A Done Deal": Man Swallowed By Humpback Whale In US Describes Encounter
articles.description: A man from the United States has recalled how he nearly died last year, after being swallowed by a giant humpback whale.

articles.headline: Prince William To Move Family Into Cottage Near Queen Elizabeth II
articles.description: Prince William, the Duke of Cambridge, plans to move his family into a cottage on his grandmother Queen Elizabeth II's Windsor Castle estate to be closer to the 96-year-old monarch and royal officials, according to UK media reports on Tuesday.

articles.headline: "Russia Doesn't Have The Capacity To Capture All Of Ukraine": US Official
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin likely still wants to capture much if not all of Ukraine but has had to narrow his tactical objectives in war, Under Secretary of Defense for Policy Colin Kahl said on Tuesday.

articles.headline: WHO's Emergency Meet To Assess If Monkeypox Global Health Emergency
articles.description: Monkeypox Outbreak: The WHO said on Tuesday it would hold an emergency meeting on June 23 to determine whether to classify the global monkeypox outbreak as a public health emergency of international concern.

articles.headline: Amber Heard Makes

articles.headline: Imran Khan Admits Committing "Blunders" Leading To Party's Fall: Ex-Aide

articles.headline: Over 14 Per Cent Of World Population May Have Had Lyme Disease, Finds Study

articles.headline: Canada, Denmark To Divide Small Island In Arctic To Settle Friendly "War"
